## Public Member Functions

### convertToErrorCode() {#a47a6f4eafac52718d7bd1f0bf81e3714}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::error&#95;code llvm::ResolverError::convertToErrorCode () const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Convert this error to a std::error&#95;code.

This is a temporary crutch to enable interaction with code still using std::error&#95;code. It will be removed in the future.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugloc-h/#l00153">153</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugloc-h">DWARFDebugLoc.h</a>.
